title: (x) Australien Book Review - Monotype Ehrhardt {Brandon Schoech}
content:
Ms Radloff:   
   
It appears to be [Monotype Ehrhardt](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111233857/http:/www.myfonts.com/FontFamily26298.html).   
   
--Brandon
author: bschoech

comments.content: (Although "Australian Book Review" is set in Times New Roman.)
